sentence.text: We aimed to identify the genetic cause of the devastating neurodegenerative disease amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (signal transduction) in a German family with two affected individuals, and to assess the prevalence of variants in the identified risk gene, phosphatidylinositol biosynthetic process, in a central European ALS cohort.

Additionally, novel or rare heterozygous phosphatidylinositol biosynthetic process missense variants predicted to be deleterious were detected in five sporadic signal transduction patients revealing an overall FIG4 variant frequency of 3% in our cohort.

Four of six variants identified were previously associated with signal transduction or the motor and sensory neuropathy Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease cardiac muscle tissue development 4J (phosphatidylinositol biosynthetic process), whereas two variants were novel.
